course_description: "This course introduces the development of Chinese language from proto Sino-Tibetan roots to modern standard Chinese, and presents the chronological changes in syntax and phonology. We will discuss key historical stages in Chinese developments, and analyze it from the view of linguistics aspects."
sections: Class Nbr: 1485, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 9:45-11:15a, Instructor: H. Cheng, Status: Open
